markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Assassin Vine Wine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1908)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 47 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Crafting wine from [assassin vine](/Monsters.aspx?ID=555) berries is a dangerous process, but the resulting ruby-red drink is rich and heady. Alchemical reagents added during fermentation concentrate the vine's connection to its environment and impart them onto the imbiber. For 1 minute after drinking a glass of assassin vine wine, you have [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40) at a range of 30 feet.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Assassin Vine Wine
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 47 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 130 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 12"
pfs="Standard"
>
Assassin Vine Wine (Aged)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 47 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 350 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

Assassin vine wine that has been aged for several years— or artificially aged with alchemy—develops both a greater complexity of flavor and a stronger connection to an assassin vine's bond with nature. When you drink the wine, vegetation in a 20-foot emanation around you begins to writhe, becoming difficult terrain until the start of your next turn.
name: Assassin Vine Wine
